title: Is there a problem with RP purchasing ?
body: I currently bought 35 dollars worth of RP and was Qued for a match just a few mins ago and it still charged me on my bank account the 35 but i never got the RP for it. Is there a problem with the store or something cause I want RP I paid for.

replies.body: It can take a few minutes before your RP totals update sometimes, which might have been the case here. I've got your account pulled up and it looks like that RP did finally come through for you, and you were able to spend some of it, but let me know if you still haven't gotten it!
